tools: [{"name": "searchQuestions", "description": "Search for questions on StackExchange based on a set of criteria.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"q": {"type": "string", "description": "Optional. The sort order of the results (relevance, votes, creation, activity)."}, "page": {"type": "integer", "description": "Optional. Integer. The page number of the results."}, "pagesize": {"type": "integer", "description": "Optional. Integer. The number of results per page."}}, "required": []}, "output": "A list of questions matching the search criteria.", "format": "application/json", "structure": "Array[Object{question_id, title, tags: Array[string], creation_date, owner: Object{user_id, display_name}}]"}, {"name": "getQuestionById", "description": "Retrieve a specific question by its ID.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"question_id": {"type": "integer", "description": "Required. Integer. The ID of the question to retrieve."}}, "required": ["question_id"]}, "output": "The question details.", "format": "application/json", "structure": "Object{question_id, title, body, tags: Array[string], creation_date, owner: Object{user_id, display_name}}"}, {"name": "getUserById", "description": "Retrieve a specific user by their ID.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"user_id": {"type": "integer", "description": "Required. conversations.value: I want to familiarize myself with Angular topics on StackExchange. Can you find questions tagged with 'angular', sorted by the most recent activity, and show me the first page with 20 questions?
{"name": "searchQuestions", "arguments": {"q": "angular", "tagged": "angular", "sort": "activity", "page": 1, "pagesize": 20}}

tools: [{"name": "getCurrentWeather", "description": "Retrieves the current weather data for a specified location in Spain.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"location": {"type": tools: [{"name": "getChatRooms", "description": "Retrieve a list of chat rooms that the user has access to.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"userId": {"type": "string", "description": "The user's unique identifier."}}, "required": ["userId"]}, "output": "List of chat rooms.", "format": "application/json", "structure": "Array[Object{id, name, topic, userCount}]"}, {"name": "getMessages", "description": "Retrieve messages from a given chat room.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"roomId": {"type": "string", "description": "The chat room's unique identifier."}, "limit": {"type": "integer", "description": "The number of messages to retrieve (default is 50)."}, "beforeId": {"type": "string", "description": "Retrieve messages before this message ID."}}, "required": ["roomId"]}, "output": "List of messages.", "format": "application/json", "structure": "Array[Object{id, text, userId, username, sent}]"}, {"name": "sendMessage", "description": "Send a message to a chat room.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"roomId": {"type": "string", "description": "The chat room's unique identifier."}, "text": {"type": "string", "description": "The message text to be sent."}}, "required": []}, "output": "The sent message.", "format": "application/json", "structure": "Object{id, text, userId, username, sent}"}, {"name": "getUserActivity", "description": "Retrieve information about the user's activity in a given chat room.", "parameters": {"type": "object", "properties": {"userId": {"type": "string", "description": "The user's unique identifier."}, "roomId": {"type": "string", "description": "The chat room's unique identifier."}}, "required": ["userId", "roomId"]}, "output": "User's activity information.", "format": "application/json", "structure": "Object{messageCount, mentionCount, lastActive}"}]
